name: The Seven Stages
description: Inspired by William Shakespeare's poem All The World's A Stage comes the VR game: The Seven Stages. The player must escape each "room" that represents a stage of their life. They can escape the room by solving various puzzles of increasing difficulty.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7, Win8, Win10 Processor: Intel Core i5- 4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or greater Storage: 5.589 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win7, Win8, Win10 Processor: Intel Core i7-7820X Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 Ti or Titan Xp Storage: 5.589 GB available space
